description: A semiconductor fabrication plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns indicating potential malfunctions and suggests preventative maintenance actions.  The goal is to minimize downtime and maximize production efficiency.
initial_goal: Minimize equipment downtime in the wafer fabrication facility by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on sensor data analysis.
constraints: maintenance_window_constraints: adhere to planned shutdown periods
